name: Alien Endangered
description:
My submission for Ludum Dare 46

Theme: Keep It Alive

This was my first ludum dare and I haven't had much practice using other game making tools so I decided to keep it simple by making a game styled like a VN.  You have to balance learning about the alien creature with adjusting the ship environment to keep it healthy.

I would've liked to add a bit more complexity to this, but I ran out of time.

Feel free to let me know anything I could have done better.
